article.title: BAE to Provide Missile Warning Systems to United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Inc., Nashua, N.H., was awarded a $66,000,015 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of AN/AAR-57 common missile warning systems. The contract is in support of Foreign Military Sales for United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Md., is the contracting activity.
